articles.title: Medical Waste Management Market to increase by USD 3.32 billion during 2022-2027 | Growing healthcare industry to drive the growth - Technavio
articles.description: NEW YORK, Sept. 14, 2023 /PRNewswire/ -- The medical waste management market size is expected to grow by USD 3.32 billion between 2022 and 2027. However, the growth momentum of the market will progress at a CAGR of 5.5% during the forecast period. The market …
